CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Category_HT__c , 'CEO') , 'CEO', IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Category_HT__c , 'HOD') , 'HOD', IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Category_HT__c , 'GM') , 'GM', IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Category_HT__c , 'Manager') , 'Manager', IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Category_HT__c , 'Executive') , 'Executive', IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Category_HT__c , 'Asst Manager') , 'Asst Manager', IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Category_HT__c , 'Team Leader') , 'Team Leader', IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Category_HT__c , 'Operation Crew') , 'Operation Crew', IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Category_HT__c , 'Carpenter') , 'Carpenter', IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact__r.Category_HT__c , 'Driver') , 'Driver','--None--' ))))))))))
CustomField.label: Category
